data.name: DataTruncation
desc: reports a DataTruncation warning, on reads, or is thrown as a DataTruncation exception, on writes, when a data value is unexpectedly truncated.
The SQL state for a DataTruncation is 01004.

properties.name: DataSize
desc: contains the number of bytes of data that should have been transferred.
This number may be approximate if data conversions were being performed. The value may be -1 if the size is unknown.

properties.name: DuringRead
desc: is TRUE if a read was truncated.

properties.name: Index
desc: is the index of the parameter or column value.

properties.name: IsParameter
desc: is TRUE if a parameter value is truncated.

properties.name: TransferSize
desc: contains the number of bytes of data actually transferred.
The value may be -1 if the size is unknown.
